channel.title: Anyone got an Midi Note to CC Converter
channel.description:
Is there a way to build a Midi Note-to-CC Converter?
Examples: 1) Incomming Midi-Note C2 Channel 1 via USB -> Outgoing Midi CC 44 with Value 27 via DIN 2) Incomming Midi-Note C2# Channel 1 via USB -> Outgoing Midi CC 44 with Value 32 via DIN
Thanks, Dirk

item.title: Anyone got an Midi Note to CC Converter
item.dc:creator: @vantage
item.description:
@vantage wrote:

Ok, thanks, I wil try this and post the result.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone got an Midi Note to CC Converter

item.title: Anyone got an Midi Note to CC Converter
item.dc:creator: @TheSlowGrowth
item.description:
@TheSlowGrowth wrote:

All you need is available in the factory objects. You will find all midi related objects in the /midi/ folder.
Here is my proposal:

Copy this for each combination of midi Note and corresponding midi CC.

If there is a logical relation between the note and the CC value (e.g. (note number)*2 = (CC value)), you can use the other objects in the /midi/ folder to realize this.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone got an Midi Note to CC Converter
